description: Expert-level integrated system design with thermal, EMI, and multi-domain optimization

problems.prompt: Antarctic Research Station Microgrid Controller: Remote Antarctic station requiring reliable power integration from wind, solar, and diesel with extreme cold operation
problems.application: Remote Antarctic station requiring reliable power integration from wind, solar, and diesel with extreme cold operation

problems.prompt: Hadron Therapy Gantry Magnet Power: Cancer treatment proton/carbon beam gantry requiring rotating magnet power delivery
constraints: Current accuracy ±100 ppm for beam steering
Slip ring power transfer for rotating frame
problems.application: Cancer treatment proton/carbon beam gantry requiring rotating magnet power delivery

problems.prompt: Optical Atomic Clock RF Synthesizer Power: Next-gen optical atomic clock requiring ultra-stable power for RF synthesis at 10^-18 stability
constraints: Phase noise < -170 dBc/Hz at 1 Hz offset
Zero switching noise coupling to RF chain
problems.application: Next-gen optical atomic clock requiring ultra-stable power for RF synthesis at 10^-18 stability

problems.prompt: Plasma Wakefield Accelerator Modulator: Advanced accelerator requiring multi-GW power modulation for plasma wakefield generation
constraints: 2 ns rise time for plasma formation
Pulse width programmable 10 ns to 1 µs
problems.application: Advanced accelerator requiring multi-GW power modulation for plasma wakefield generation

problems.prompt: Photonic Quantum Computer Laser Driver: Photonic quantum processor requiring ultra-stable laser diode array power for qubit generation
constraints: Current noise < 1 nA/√Hz for wavelength stability
problems.application: Photonic quantum processor requiring ultra-stable laser diode array power for qubit generation

problems.prompt: Molten Salt Reactor Pump Motor Drive: Gen-IV nuclear reactor requiring high-temperature pump drives for molten salt circulation
constraints: Triple redundancy for safety critical function
problems.application: Gen-IV nuclear reactor requiring high-temperature pump drives for molten salt circulation

problems.prompt: Superconducting Qubit Flux Bias Supply: Transmon qubit array requiring ultra-precise flux bias current for frequency tuning
constraints: Current resolution 1 nA for flux precision
Zero heat generation at mixing chamber
problems.application: Transmon qubit array requiring ultra-precise flux bias current for frequency tuning

problems.prompt: Hyperloop Pod Levitation Power System: 1000+ km/h hyperloop pod requiring electromagnetic levitation and propulsion power
problems.application: 1000+ km/h hyperloop pod requiring electromagnetic levitation and propulsion power

problems.prompt: Exascale Supercomputer Power Plane: Exascale HPC facility requiring 100 MW+ power distribution with extreme density
problems.application: Exascale HPC facility requiring 100 MW+ power distribution with extreme density

problems.prompt: Spallation Neutron Source Chopper Drive: SNS-class facility requiring precision motor drives for neutron beam choppers
constraints: Phase jitter < 100 ns to proton pulse
problems.application: SNS-class facility requiring precision motor drives for neutron beam choppers
